results.title: Editor's Highlight: Metformin Protects Against Acetaminophen Hepatotoxicity by Attenuation of Mitochondrial Oxidant Stress and Dysfunction.
results.text_hl: Our data showed that pretreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protected against @CHEMICAL_Acetaminophen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000082 @@@APAP@@@ hepatotoxicity, as indicated by the over 80% reduction in plasma @GENE_GPT @GENE_76282 @@@alanine aminotransferase@@@ (@GENE_GPT @GENE_76282 @@@ALT@@@) activities and significant decrease in @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Emphysema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011656 @@@centrilobular@@@ @DISEASE_Necrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Du K, Ramachandran A, Weemhoff JL, Chavan H, Xie Y, Krishnamurthy P, Jaeschke H. Editor's Highlight: Metformin Protects Against Acetaminophen Hepatotoxicity by Attenuation of Mitochondrial Oxidant Stress and Dysfunction. Toxicol Sci. 2016 Dec;154(2):214-226. PMID: 27562556
